sentences.cn: …小块旋涡形的奶油夹心巧克力。

sentences.en: As the heat increases, the young hurricane begins to swirl in a counter - clockwise motion.
sentences.cn: 随着热量的增加, 新生的飓风即开始以 逆时针 方向旋转.

sentences.en: Carrie scarcely heard, her head was so full of the swirl of life.
sentences.cn: 嘉莉几乎没听到他的话.这旋风般的生活画面充满了她的头脑.

sentences.en: Dancers spun in a swirl of skirts.
sentences.cn: 跳舞的人旋转着,裙子也不停地打转.

sentences.en: He breathes out a swirl of cigarette smoke.
He would nod as he watched the wind swirl dust and sand past him.
sentences.cn: 看着那裹着灰沙的风从他面前扫过去,他点点头.

sentences.en: I could feel the current swirl me.
sentences.cn: 我感觉到河里的急流在卷着我.

sentences.en: She danced with a swirl of her skirt.
sentences.cn: 她跳起舞来裙子直打旋.

sentences.en: Some odd smells thethe swirl, nausea and even the uncomfortableness of eyes.
sentences.cn: 时常能闻到一些怪味道,也有头晕 、 恶心、眼睛不舒服的状况.

sentences.en: The bigger ones dived deeper, leaving a swirl on the surface as they flicked their tails.
sentences.cn: 稍大些的鱼藏在深处, 偶尔一露背儿,忙着转身下去,给水面留下个旋涡与一些碎纹.

sentences.en: The car raced roughly along in a swirl of pink dust.
sentences.cn: 汽车在一股粉红色尘土的漩涡中颠簸着快速前进.

sentences.en: The river had become a swirling torrent.
sentences.cn: 河水变成了翻滚的洪流。

sentences.en: The straightening vanes minimize swirl from piping arrangements upstream.
sentences.cn: 整流叶片最大程度减小管道上游的漩涡.

sentences.en: The thing is a swirl of events.
The whole of Harlem seemed to fall apart in the swirl of snow.
sentences.cn: 整个哈莱姆区好象散落在纷纷扬扬的雪花中了.

sentences.en: Therefore by regulating swirl number of combustor NO emission caw be reduced.
sentences.cn: 因此,适当调整燃烧室的旋流数可以降低NO排放.

sentences.en: You could lie up there, watching the flakes swirl past.
sentences.cn: 你可以躺在那儿, 看着雪花飘飘.

phrases.tran_cn: 涡流室，涡流式燃烧室；涡良烧室

trans.tran_cn: （水，风等的）旋转，漩涡，<美>弯曲，涡状形，卷状的东西

trans.tran_en: to move around quickly in a twisting circular movement, or to make something do this

trans.tran_cn: 旋转，打旋，眩晕，盘绕，大口喝酒
使成漩涡，使眼花，打转，弯曲盘旋

trans.tran_en: to move around quickly in a twisting circular movement, or to make something do this
